title: Leading bar soap brands ranked by sales value in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2014
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Sales in million GBP for 3 number of Soap Bar Brands.
The Sales in million GBP is appeared to be the highest at Soap Bar Brand Dove and lowest at Soap Bar Brand Simple.
The highest Soap Bar Brand Dove has 21.0 more Sales in million GBP than the lowest Soap Bar Brand Simple.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Soap Bar Brand in the x axis and Sales in million GBP in the y axis.
The Sales in million GBP is highest at Soap Bar Brand Dove and lowest at Soap Bar Brand Simple.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Sales in million GBP for 3 number of Soap Bar Brands.
The Sales in million GBP is appeared to be the highest at Soap Bar Brand Dove and lowest at Soap Bar Brand Simple.
The highest Soap Bar Brand Dove has 21.0 more Sales in million GBP than the lowest Soap Bar Brand Simple.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Soap Bar Brand in the x axis and Sales in million GBP in the y axis.
Soap Bar Brand Dove has the highest Sales in million GBP and Simple has the lowest Sales in million GBP.
Second maximum Sales in million GBP is found at Soap Bar Brand Imperial Leather.
The difference of Sales in million GBP between the highest and lowest Soap Bar Brand is 21.0.
The highest value 26.8 at Dove is almost 1.84 times larger than the average value 14.57.
The Sales in million GBP is 43.7 if we add up values of all Soap Bar Brands.
